post.text: Join Me Live In Portsmouth, NH!

comment.author: Derek
comment.text: Praying for this man, our country, all of us deplorables......actually praying the hillary supporters see the truth before they vote.

replies.author: Jacob
replies.text: I'm with you, Derek. I just can't wrap my head around on how educated people can think that Hillary is so great when there is so much proof of her lies and corrupt ways.
